p: Results show that the coating of the reference sample is made of a Mn 2.5(HPO 4)(PO 4)(H 2O) 2 (manganese hydrogen phosphate hydrate) phase, with an average crystallite size of 100 nm. In the case of A_2, see Figure 13B, the sample coating was made of two phases; the same as observed for a reference sample and Fe 2PO 4(OH). The low quality of the XRD pattern is due to low crystallinity and precludes crystallite size estimation.
